text: Akasalaloniki velle margalu! Mariyu vati dvara nenu musa devunni cudataniki. Endukante, niscayanga, nenu atanini asatyavadiga bhavistunnanu!" Mariyu i vidhanga phira'aun ku tana duskaryalu manciviga kanabaddayi. Mariyu atadu sanmargam nundi nirodhincabaddadu. Mariyu phira'aun yokka prati pannagam atanini nasananiki matrame guri cesindi
